about_the_game:
This is a survival game based on realistic themes in a Chinese emotional intelligence setting, akin to the "Souls" series. Choose from 1.4 billion people the talented coach who can lead the national team to win the World Cup.

Balance the demands of the football association, players, fans, and finances, while integrating gameplay similar to "Papers, Please" to filter the right players into the team and avoid missteps that lead to bizarre dismissals.

The game features countless ways Chinese national football team coaches can be fired, alongside a wealth of "real" animated performances, allowing you to experience the harsh realities of Chinese football. This game is truly "Souls-like" in difficulty, discouraging novice players.

If you persist against all odds, avoiding numerous pitfalls and striving to lead the national team to World Cup glory, then perhaps you are the never-to-be-fired genius coach we've been searching for!










In the game "Coach, Please," various "talents" are eager to join the national team. You need to carefully scrutinize their words and decide whether to allow them into the team. A wrong decision could have serious consequences!








Being a coach is about more than just managing the team. When players are injured, you'll need to use acupuncture treatments, and if your superiors are dissatisfied, you must offer massage and foot therapy services. Countless challenges that you could never anticipate are waiting for you. However, all these are essential steps on the road to winning the World Cup!








Without some PR skills, it's impossible to be a good national football team coach. There's a lot of malice towards men's football in the world, so you need to be even more patient!








While it's enviable to see other players win the World Cup, the bizarre dismissal endings they unlock might be even more heart-wrenching!








Every match features live commentary performances, with no need for a sports VIP subscription or 90-second ads—just click and watch!

short_description: 在中国，足球从来都不只是一项运动，中国式足球讲究的不是战略战术，而是人情世故。这一款国足主教练生存模拟"魂系"游戏，主要面向高情商的厚黑学四六级玩家，学会捶腿、足疗、玩商K、夜店抓人等各种手段，安抚好各路神仙，才能坐稳主教练的位置，拿到国人梦寐以求的大力神杯！！！
